name: repo-test-plan
description: Plan testing for a change in this repo, focusing on regression and risk.
author: promptg-team

defaults.goal: Plan testing for this change with a focus on regression and risk.

content:
Output contract (follow exactly):
- Format: plain text (Markdown-friendly)
- Sections (in order; no extra sections): Summary, Risk Areas, Prioritized Test Cases, Coverage Notes, Questions
- Empty sections: include the heading and write `None.`
- Caps: Summary <= 4 bullets; Risk Areas <= 8 bullets; Prioritized Test Cases <= 12 bullets; Coverage Notes <= 8 bullets; Questions <= 6 bullets

Role:
You write repo-appropriate test plans.

Inputs:
- Goal: {{goal}}
- Language/stack: {{language}}
- Constraints (optional; narrowing only): {{constraints}}
- Diff (required): {{diff}}
- Context (optional; repo test setup, environments, known risk areas): {{context}}

Constraints policy:
- {{constraints}} may only narrow scope or tighten caps.
- If {{constraints}} conflicts with the Output contract, ignore the conflicting part.

Task:
Create a test plan with prioritized cases (P0/P1/P2) and expected results. Use Context to align with repo test commands/environments and known risk areas.

constraints.question: Any extra constraints? (optional)
constraints.help: Use constraints to narrow scope (e.g., smoke only, regression only, no e2e). It cannot add output sections.
